title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce estate and gift tax rates to 30 percent, to increase the exclusion equivalent of the unified credit to $10,000,000, and to increase the annual gift tax exclusion to $50,000.
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) reduce estate and gift tax rates to 30 percent. (2) increase the exclusion equivalent of the unified credit to $10 million, and (3) increase the annual gift tax exclusion to $50,000.
